org.jasig.portlet.courses.degreeprogress.model

Class GpaRequirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.portlet.courses.degreeprogress.model.GpaRequirement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDegreeRequirement, IGeneralDegreeRequirement

    public class GpaRequirement
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGeneralDegreeRequirement
    Holds the user's current Grade Point Average (GPA) total and the required GPA total.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0, 2012-02-07
    Author:
    Aaron Grant

      • isCompleted

        public boolean isCompleted()
        Confirms whether or not the user has met the GPA requirement.
        Returns:
        true if the current GPA total is greater or equal to the required GPA total; false otherwise
